full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Title and Details

* **English Title:** Anthrasil - Anthrax Immune Globulin (Human) for infusion
* **French Title:** Anthrasil - Immunoglobuline anthrax (humain) pour perfusion
* **Reference Number:** WS4223456330-Doc4223476759
* **Amendment Number:** 0

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date:** September 21st, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 13th, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1st, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** No end date specified

### Contract Status and Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) Date:** September 21st, 2023

### Contract Requirements

* **Procurement Method:** The contract will be awarded by Advance Contract Award Notice

### Trade Agreements

* The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Deliveries and Address

* **Regions of Delivery:** The contract will be delivered to the following regions:
	+ National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 
	+ English Address: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
	+ French Address: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC), 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec
